item.title: Other things I made
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: Kicker & Let’s Get Married The two that (re)started my journey into animation. When I wanted to get back into 3D I decided the best way to learn was to make a short film, and so I made Kicker. After the initial idea I read up on film theory, cinematography, editing before actually learning a 3D software, and then started to build the models and animate them.
